text: 5.23-24: Mt 8.4 naŋga, 18.15-20 naŋga, 23.19 naŋga, Mk 11.25 naŋga, 1 Ti 2.8 naŋga, 1 Pi 3.8Na Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋgurɨm, kɨrañɨŋguhu pinayɨrɨm uta, indarɨmitɨna nasi vaha mana nara naŋga vaha nandɨ pɨmɨ vana kɨtiŋgata, kɨrañɨŋguhu hɨm ha kɨrañɨŋguhu pina arɨhañɨ tama. Kamata aŋga pata pɨmɨ ha mɨŋasɨrɨvɨna avindɨti, uta Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋgu.
